title: How to use Charles Viancin® POPPY® silicone lids?
description:
View the demo of our Charles Viancin® POPPY® innovative, fun & functional silicone lids, inspired by the bold red petals of the poppy flower.

Our lids in a nutshell :
- Easy to use
- Save on plastic wrap & aluminium foil
- Airtight seal
- Oven & microwave safe. All flame.
- Easy to clean and dishwasher safe

Our lids are available in many other styles
